message.content:
cs.CV, cs.GR, cs.HC, cs.MM, cs.RO 

This paper involves computer vision techniques for real-time 3D facial performance capture, which falls under the category of computer vision (cs.CV). It also involves graphics and virtual reality (cs.GR) since it deals with creating immersive experiences using VR headsets. The paper also addresses human-computer interaction (cs.HC) since it aims to facilitate face-to-face communication for HMD users. Additionally, it involves multimedia (cs.MM) since it deals with capturing and rendering 3D avatars. Finally, it involves robotics (cs.RO) since it deals with capturing and tracking human motion, which is relevant for robotics applications.
